meanings.definition: The long bone in the upper leg of a human or animal.
meanings.sent1: The thighbone supports the body when standing.
meanings.sent2: She broke her thighbone in a skiing accident.
meanings.sent3: The thighbone decided to take a break from all the walking.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as a thighbone.
meanings.sent5: The thighbone, like a pillar, held up the structure of the leg.

meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the thighbone for any fractures.
meanings.sent2: He felt a sharp pain in his thighbone after the fall.
meanings.sent3: The thighbone felt like the king of the leg bones.
meanings.sent4: Her thighbone was as sturdy as an oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The thighbone, a vital part of the leg, allowed for movement and strength.
